pages.title: Usage
pages.text: 使用一个$(thing)燃烧类机器$()，将原料放在上方，将燃料放在底部，然后用$(l:appendix/ignition)点火装置$()点燃燃料。$(p)$(info_cn) $(thing)燃烧类机器$()可以用水来节约燃料。（指浇灭后，不再继续燃烧）

pages.title: Automation
pages.text: $(info_cn) Regarding automation, input ingredients are inserted into the top, or top sides, of the device, fuel is inserted into the bottom sides, and output items are extracted from the bottom.
